p: Thirty-six calves were successfully randomized; 34 completed the protocol. Two, one in the ibuprofen starting on day 3 treatment arm, and one in the placebo arm were euthanized for severe respiratory distress on days 6 and 7 respectively. Both calves were in the first replicate. All calves developed clinical illness and viral shedding, and all received their assigned treatments. Baseline characteristics for each treatment arm are shown in Table 2.
